tool_description: Horoscope API - Professional Horoscopes as a simple JSON API - Access 12 horoscopes every day, written by professional astrologers. Important: Only Portuguese (PT) language is currently available.
title: Horoscope API

api_list.name: Get a daily horoscope
api_list.description: Get a daily horoscope for the horoscope sign.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://horoscope-api.p.rapidapi.com/{langid}/{signid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "horoscope-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

utterances.utterance: What is today's horoscope for Aquarius in Portuguese?
Can you give me the daily horoscope for Pisces in Portuguese?
I'd like to know the horoscope for Aries today in Portuguese.
Tell me the horoscope for Taurus in Portuguese.
What does the horoscope say for Gemini today in Portuguese?
Can I get the daily horoscope for Cancer in Portuguese?
What is the horoscope for Leo today in Portuguese?
Please provide the horoscope for Virgo in Portuguese.
I want to know the daily horoscope for Libra in Portuguese.
What's the horoscope for Scorpio today in Portuguese?

api_list.name: Glossary
api_list.description: This endpoint returns a JSON with information about the API. In it you can preview request and response templates, mandatory fields and much more.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://horoscope-api.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "horoscope-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

utterances.utterance: Can you provide me with information about the Horoscope API?
What details does the Glossary endpoint offer about the Horoscope API?
Show me the request and response templates for the Horoscope API.
What are the mandatory fields required by the Horoscope API?
Give me an overview of the Horoscope API functionalities.
Can I see examples of how to use the Horoscope API?
What kind of data does the Horoscope API provide?
How can I access the daily horoscopes using the Horoscope API?
Is there any documentation available for the Horoscope API?
